description: Custom table for MyCustomApp application logs

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was generated

columns.name: Computer
columns.description: Name of the computer that generated the event

columns.name: EventID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the event type

columns.name: EventCategory
columns.description: Category of the event (Info, Warning, Error, Critical)

columns.name: ProcessID
columns.description: Process ID that generated the event

columns.name: ExecutionTime
columns.description: Time taken to execute the operation in milliseconds

columns.name: AdditionalData
columns.description: Additional JSON data for extended properties

columns.name: IsError
columns.description: Indicates if this is an error event
